main event: An object fell on the ground and burnt a hole. The object glowed without a flame for about three minutes. Residue was analyzed and it was determined to have been from a flare.
interesting points: The object fell on the ground and burned a hole, glowing without a flame for about three minutes.
Residue from the object was analyzed and determined to have been from a flare.
A newspaper article mentioned a mysterious flaming object burning a hole in the pavement, which was later identified as an emergency road flare.
An investigation was conducted into 7 unknown objects seen during an auto trip in Detroit, Michigan.
A woman found a burning object on the pavement and a laboratory analysis determined it to be an emergency road flare.
sighted object: glowing object that burned a hole in the pavement
